subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: With six players 40 or older, there are obvious health concerns at Mets’ camp. But their presence also adds a richer dimension to a team that integrated players young and old with great success last season.
snippet: With six players 40 or older, there are obvious health concerns at Mets’ camp. But their presence also adds a richer dimension to a team that integrated players young and old with great success last season.
